name: listToArray
description: Copies the elements of a list to an array.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: A Boolean value specifying whether to create empty array entries if there are two delimiters in a row.

params.name: multiCharacterDelimiter
params.description: A Boolean value specifying whether the delimiters parameter specifies a multi-character delimiter.

examples.title: Simple example for listToArray function
examples.description: Uses the listToArray() function to retrieve a list as an array

examples.title: Example for listToArray function with delimiter
examples.description: Uses the listToArray() function with a semicolon delimiter to retrieve a list as an array

examples.title: Example for listToArray function with includeEmptyFields
examples.description: If includeEmptyFields is true, empty value add in array elements

examples.title: Example for listToArray function with multiCharacterDelimiter
examples.description: Uses the listToArray() function to retrieve a list as an array with multiCharacterDelimiter
